summary: Provided backend implementation prompt in Farsi outlining new APIs: notifications (list/mark-read, read_at migration), dashboard summary stats, booking conversation POST with file and ascending order, 24h cancellation/reschedule rule with errors and fees, availability validation with slot_unavailable, pagination alignment on list endpoints including top-rated/loyalty, monthly top-rated with pagination, wallet transactions endpoint filtered by beauty, consistent BeautyApiResponse and payment methods.
current_status: Frontend changes done; backend prompt prepared for Laravel updates.
